reviewText: This movie should be mandatory watching for any serious student of American or Canadian history. It is difficult to say you are an expert in American history, if you are unaware of how American history is different in contrast to its closest neighbor and ally to the north. The movie is well-acted and entertaining. It is neat to see what was happening in Canada at the exact time ofand immediately afterthe American Civil War.

Amazing well done historical piece. I watched for Rob Stewart and was completely drawn into the story disregarding who was in it. Very educational on Canadian history. As an American, I learned a lot! Highly recommend!!!!
